metadata.summary: Catalog of 15 LimaCharlie-developed extensions including Artifact, BinLib, Dumper, EPP, Exfil, Git Sync, and YARA Manager
metadata.primary_use_case: Discovering and selecting LimaCharlie-built extensions for specific security capabilities

cross_refs.description: Explains the extension framework these LimaCharlie extensions are built on
Explains how to interact with these extensions using configurations and requests
Provides context on add-on marketplace where these extensions are found
Lists extensions built by third parties rather than LimaCharlie
